title: Calories in Matcha
meta_description: Discover calories in matcha per teaspoon serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition facts for this green tea powder.
assumptions: Pure matcha green tea powder, ceremonial grade, unsweetened; 1 tsp â‰ˆ 2 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grade, brand, processing, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of matcha powder contains about 6 kcal and provides antioxidants.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp sugar per tsp matcha
In matcha latte with 1 cup (240 ml) almond milk
Culinary grade matcha (slightly higher starch content)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tsp of matcha?
faqs.a: About 6 kcal for 1 tsp (2 g) of pure matcha powder.

faqs.q: Does matcha have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Low carbs at 0.6 g per tsp, with 0 g sugars and 0.4 g fiber.
Approximately 0.5 g protein per teaspoon serving.

faqs.q: Calories in matcha latte vs plain matcha?
faqs.a: Plain is ~6 kcal per tsp; latte adds 30-100+ kcal depending on milk and sweeteners.

faqs.q: Is matcha low calorie for weight loss?
faqs.a: Yes, very low at 6 kcal per tsp, plus metabolism-boosting catechins.
